channel.title: Mobile Throne of Lies?
channel.description: Hey, sometimes I'm on the go and feel like I want to play Throne of Lies. Is that a possibility in the future? I feel like if you added a copy paste button to the will screen, it would be easy to play on the phone, as everything else involves point and click. Even drawing the deathnote probably becomes easier on phone. It's something to consider if you guys want to break into that market, as I'd love to be able to play a quick game of ToL anywhere.

item.title: Mobile Throne of Lies?

I mean, it might work for Tablets but phones? Too small O_O

item.title: Mobile Throne of Lies?
item.dc:creator: terumi
item.description:
Hey, sometimes I’m on the go and feel like I want to play Throne of Lies. Is that a possibility in the future? I feel like if you added a copy paste button to the will screen, it would be easy to play on the phone, as everything else involves point and click. Even drawing the deathnote probably becomes easier on phone. It’s something to consider if you guys want to break into that market, as I’d love to be able to play a quick game of ToL anywhere.
